column1: '''Leslie Ellen Jones''' holds a Ph.D. in Folklore and Mythology Studies from [[wikipedia:UCLA|UCLA]]
column2: with a specialization in comparative and Celtic mythology. She has written extensively on modern uses of mythology in popular fiction

column1: * [http://www.greenwood.com/catalog/author/J/Leslie_Ellen_Jones.aspx Leslie Ellen Jones] at [http://www.greenwood.com/ Greenwood Publishing Group]
